getFieldComparator

public Comparator getFieldComparator(String fieldId)
Returns a comparator for the specifeid field.

First, a custom comparator is returned if found.

Otherwise a comparator is tryed to create according to the field type returned by getFieldType(String). Also isIgnoreCase() and getLocale() is considered for creating the new comparator.

Parameters:
fieldId - field Id.
Returns:
comparator for this field.

addFieldType

public void addFieldType(String fieldId,
                         Class type)

getFieldType

public Class getFieldType(String fieldId)
Returns the field type.

Returns null if no type specifeid for this field or no such field exists.

Parameters:
fieldId - field Id.
Returns:
type of this field.
